hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command:
call "C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 10.0\VC\vcvarsall.bat"
cd %WORKSPACE% set path=%path:"=% set VECTORCAST_DIR=%WIN_VECTORCAST_DIR% set VECTOR_LICENSE_FILE=C:\flexlm\vector-IDCWIN2.lic set PYTHONPATH=C:\Python27\Lib\site-packages\junit_xml-1.0-py2.7.egg
xcopy /S /I /E %WIN_GIT_DIR%\tests tests /Q /Y
cd %WORKSPACE% rem mkdir tbuild32_cyg cd tbuild32_cyg set PATH=C:\cygwin\bin;%PATH% rebase -s /cygdrive/n/shared/.VCAST_REGRESSION/JOB_6PM/VCAST_WINDOWS/lib/cygVcRecorderLib.dll rebase -s /cygdrive/n/shared/.VCAST_REGRESSION/JOB_6PM/VCAST_WINDOWS/lib64/cygVcRecorderLib.dll rem bash -c "cmake ../tests -DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=gcc -DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER=g++" rem %VECTORCAST_DIR%\vpython VcRunTests.py --metrics --vcast_dir=N:\\shared\\.VCAST_REGRESSION\\JOB_6PM\\win_54972 --run_tests=vcInstTest,VcutilTest || call:handle_error rem %VECTORCAST_DIR%\vpython VcRunTests.py --metrics --run_tests=HelloTest cd HelloTest make clean del ..\h.db rem %VECTORCAST_DIR%\vcshell --tag="HelloTest_2018Apr16-111103" --db="C:\SlaveJenkins\workspace\Cygwin32\tbuild32_cyg\h.db" --echo --metrics --cfg="C:\SlaveJenkins\workspace\Cygwin32\tbuild32_cyg" make make
rem Collect results rem %VECTORCAST_DIR%\vpython VcCollectResult.py --db=N:\shared\Jenkins_Result\vcshell.db --tag=cygwin32 rem %VECTORCAST_DIR%\vpython VcRegressionResult.py --db=N:\shared\Jenkins_Result/regression.db --tag=cygwin32 --storeresult
